title: Can someone help me change my language?
body:
I am playing on the NA servers and want to change my in game text and VO to french. 
how do i do it?

replies.body: Each region has their own set of [supported languages](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language).  Currently, NA only supports English so it's not possible to get that changed.    Some players might suggest using a third party to make that happen, but keep in mind it's not something we support.  Meaning, we won't be able to assist if you run into problems.  Sorry about that!
